scripts.cleanup: for file in $(find packages/app public -type f -iname *.map 2>/dev/null); do rm $file ${file%.*}; done
scripts.build: npm run createfirebaseconf; npm run cleanup; NODE_ENV=production webpack -p; babel $(find packages/app -type f -iname *.jsx) --plugins syntax-jsx -s --retain-lines -d ./
scripts.build:dev: npm run createfirebaseconf; npm run cleanup; webpack -d
scripts.build:watch: npm run createfirebaseconf; npm run cleanup; webpack --watch
scripts.deploy: yarn build; firebase deploy; yarn cleanup
